text: Compared with patients without dry eye , patients with dry eye had significantly increased levels of oxidative stress , higher OSDI and FCT scores , and significantly lower Schirmer 's test and BUT scores .

Participants were randomly assigned to three groups receiving : ( 1 ) Folate-1 : 1 mg/day folate supplements ( n = 27 ) ; ( 2 ) Folate-5 : 5 mg/day folate supplements ( n = 27 ) , and ( 3 ) placebo ( n = 27 ) for 8 weeks .

Post-ICU hospital-based rehabilitation , including increased physical and nutritional therapy plus information provision , did not improve physical recovery or HRQOL , but improved patient satisfaction with many aspects of recovery .
The findings from the present study suggest that an exercise program that includes a supervised and home-based training phase is effective , adhered to , and safe in patients with CKD .
